hero.title: NIKOLETTA MARTYNOVYCH PERSONAL WEBSITE
hero.subtitle: Want to learn how to do perfect makeup yourself? Take author's makeup courses from Nikoletta Martynovych. All current courses can be found below

about.title: ABOUT AUTHOR
about.description: My name is Nika ‚Äî I'm a makeup artist with over 6 years of experience in the beauty industry. My passion is to highlight the uniqueness of every woman through makeup. I actively work with clients and teach girls the art of makeup ‚Äî with love, accessibility, and without complex schemes.
about.description2: I sincerely believe that makeup is not about masks, but about lightness, confidence, and self-care. That's why I teach not only techniques, but also love for the process. Makeup can be simple and bring joy even in everyday routine life.
about.description3: I am the founder and owner of The Beauty Bar beauty studio, where I created a space where everyone can feel special.
about.description4: Professionalism, attention to detail, and genuine support ‚Äî these are what guide me in my work every day.

experience.techniques: Space of beauty and inspiration in Berehovo
experience.clients: Owner of The Beauty Bar studio

courses.description2: I will show you how to do daily and evening makeup, tell you about choosing cosmetics, and share simple techniques that are easy to repeat.
courses.description3: This course is about care, confidence, and pleasure from every brush stroke.

beginner.question: Will the course suit me if I don't know how to do makeup at all?
beginner.answer: Yes! The course is specially created for both beginners and girls who already do makeup but still have questions ‚Äî everything is explained simply and step by step.

products.question: What products will I need for learning?
products.answer: The course includes a presentation with a basic cosmetics list. I also give recommendations on how to adapt the lessons to the products you already have.

minimal.question: What if I have minimal cosmetics?
minimal.answer: That's not a problem. I'll show you how to do makeup even with a minimal set. And in the "Premium" package, I'll also help you select products within your budget.

duration.question: How long will it take to complete the course?
duration.answer: The course consists of two lessons. You take it at your own pace ‚Äî you'll have access to all materials, so you can watch anytime.

access.question: How long will I have access to the lessons?
access.answer: Course access is forever. You can return to it anytime.

premium.question: How does the "Premium" package differ?
premium.answer: In it, you'll get my personal support, analysis of your cosmetics bag, and recommendations specifically for you. It's an individual approach and more attention to your needs.

delivery.question: How will I get access to the course after payment?
delivery.answer: After payment, you'll receive a link to a private Telegram channel where all lessons and materials will be.
